Consider the following structures for a domain model of a software development company using SCRUM:
Entities.csv
```csv
ID,Name,SetName,Index,Description,Attribute0,Attribute1,Attribute2,Attribute3,Attribute4,Attribute5,Attribute6,Attribute7,Attribute8
E0,Project,P,p,The product or initiative to be developed,id,name,project_start,project_end,description,budget,status,target_audience,priority
E1,Team,T,t,"Self-organized, cross-functional development team",id,name,team_size,team_start,team_status,location,team_type,,
E2,Worker,W,w,Individual team member working on the project,id,name,first_name,email,start_date,status,availability,,
E3,Feature,F,f,Mid-sized functionality,id,title,description,status,priority,estimated_effort,,,
E4,Skill,S,s,Professional or social competence of a worker,id,label,description,level,certified,category,,,
E5,Role,R,r,Defined responsibilities within the Scrum team,id,role_name,description,area_of_responsibility,,,,,
E6,ProductOwner,PO,po,Responsible for product vision and Product Backlog,id,name,email,availability,,,,,
E7,ScrumMaster,SM,sm,Supports the team in applying Scrum,id,name,email,experience,,,,,
E8,ProductBacklog,PB,pb,Ordered list of all requirements,id,created_on,last_updated,number_of_entries,status,,,,
E9,Sprint,SP,sp,Fixed time period for creating an increment,id,sprint_number,start_date,end_date,status,achievement_of_goal,,,
E10,SprintPlanning,SPP,spp,Kick-off meeting for Sprint preparation,id,date,duration_(min),moderation,outcome_documentation,,,,

Based on Entities.csv and Relationships.csv - Proceed and Create 3 individual CSV code-blocks (alternative: files) in chat named: Goals.csv + Conditions.csv + DecisionVariables.csv
Goals.csv must have the following header: "ID,Name,Description,IsSum,GoalType,EntityName,EntityAttribute,CriteriaType,Weight"
Conditions.csv must have the following header: "ID,Name,Description,IsSum,GoalType,EntityName,EntityAttribute,CriteriaType,Weight"
DecisionVariables.csv must have the following header: "ID,Name,Description,DataType,Domain,MinValue,MaxValue"

The following conventions must be applied:
ID starts with a letter G(oals), C(onditions), D(ecision)V(ariables) and a number follows, starting at 0, 1, 2, ....
Name is written snake_case
Names for Goals must begin with "maximize_" or "minimize_"
IsSum is a boolean { True, False }
GoalType is one of { "min", "max" }
EntityName is always only 1 entry from the "Name" of Entities.csv
EntityAttribute is one of the values in the "Attribute0" to "Attribute8" of the targeted Entity in Entities.csv
CriteriaType is a number { 2 = Must-Match, 1 = May-Match, 0 = Cannot-Match }
Domain can represent set of values like "{0,1}"
MinValue is the smallest value that can be set
MaxValue is the highest value that can be set
Weight is a mulptlier
Created 10 to 15 entries in each of these files.

Use ALL of the previously provided and generated CSV data (Entities, Relations, Goals, Conditions, DecisionVariables) and formulate the optimization model mathematically and logically. 
Write it into a code-block for a LaTeX (.tex) file and provide the generated Latex code in chat.
The file consists of a introduction page with Title, Author, Date and Table of Contents.
The actual file contest consists of 5 different \sections labeled "1. Sets (Entities)", "2. Indices", "3. Goals", "4. Conditions", "5. DecisionVariables"
The items of each category are itemized between \begin and \end.
Goals and Conditions show both their IDs, Names and the logical and mathematical representation

Transform all of the provided and generated CSV data (Entities, Attributes, Relations, Goals, Conditions, DecisionVariables) into a graph using the Mermaid.js Live Editor graph TD syntax.
Connect...
- Entities with their Attributes and place the Attributes around the Entities they belong to. (can exist multiple times in the graph to make lines less short)
- Entities with their Relations
- Goals with the Entity/Attributes
- Conditions with the Entity/Attributes
- DecisionVariables with their relevant Entities

Colorize...
- Entities in blue
- Attributes in white
- Relations in orange
- Goals in green
- Conditions in red
- Decision Variables in purple

Provide all 5 code-blocks (files) in chat:
3 Comma-Seperated-Values (csv), 1 LaTeX (tex), 1 Mermaid (mmd)

content_list.content:
Here are the **five code blocks** as requested:

1. `Goals.csv`  
2. `Conditions.csv`  
3. `DecisionVariables.csv`  
4. `model.tex` (LaTeX)  
5. `domain_model.mmd` (Mermaid.js)

### ✅ **4. model.tex (LaTeX)**
```latex
\documentclass[12pt]{article}
\usepackage{amsmath}
\usepackage{geometry}
\usepackage{hyperref}
\usepackage{enumitem}
\usepackage{titlesec}

\geometry{margin=1in}
\title{SCRUM-Based Software Development Optimization Model}
\author{Domain Modeling System}
\date{\today}
\titleformat{\section}{\large\bfseries}{\thesection}{1em}{}

\begin{document}

\maketitle
\tableofcontents
\newpage

\section{1. Sets (Entities)}
\begin{itemize}
    \item $\mathcal{P}$: Set of Projects
    \item $\mathcal{T}$: Set of Teams
    \item $\mathcal{W}$: Set of Workers
    \item $\mathcal{F}$: Set of Features
    \item $\mathcal{S}$: Set of Skills
    \item $\mathcal{R}$: Set of Roles
    \item $\mathcal{PO}$: Set of Product Owners
    \item $\mathcal{SM}$: Set of Scrum Masters
    \item $\mathcal{PB}$: Set of Product Backlogs
    \item $\mathcal{SP}$: Set of Sprints
    \item $\mathcal{US}$: Set of User Stories
    \item $\mathcal{TSK}$: Set of Tasks
    \item $\mathcal{BL}$: Set of Blockers
    \item $\mathcal{SH}$: Set of Stakeholders
    \item $\mathcal{VEL}$: Set of Velocity Records
    \item $\mathcal{REP}$: Set of Release Plans
    \item $\mathcal{RM}$: Set of Roadmaps
    \item $\mathcal{DEV}$: Set of Development Snapshots
    \item $\mathcal{FED}$: Set of Feature Documentations
\end{itemize}

\section{2. Indices}
\begin{itemize}
    \item $p \in \mathcal{P}$: Index for projects
    \item $t \in \mathcal{T}$: Index for teams
    \item $w \in \mathcal{W}$: Index for workers
    \item $f \in \mathcal{F}$: Index for features
    \item $s \in \mathcal{S}$: Index for skills
    \item $r \in \mathcal{R}$: Index for roles
    \item $sp \in \mathcal{SP}$: Index for sprints
    \item $u \in \mathcal{US}$: Index for user stories
    \item $k \in \mathcal{TSK}$: Index for tasks
    \item $b \in \mathcal{BL}$: Index for blockers
    \item $sh \in \mathcal{SH}$: Index for stakeholders
    \item $v \in \mathcal{VEL}$: Index for velocity records
    \item $rp \in \mathcal{REP}$: Index for release plans
    \item $m \in \mathcal{RM}$: Index for roadmaps
    \item $d \in \mathcal{DEV}$: Index for development snapshots
    \item $fd \in \mathcal{FED}$: Index for feature documentations
\end{itemize}

\section{3. Goals}
\begin{itemize}
    \item[G0] \texttt{maximize\_project\_budget}: $\max \sum_{p \in \mathcal{P}} \text{budget}_p \cdot \text{Weight}_{G0}$
    \item[G1] \texttt{minimize\_project\_duration}: $\min \sum_{p \in \mathcal{P}} (\text{project\_end}_p - \text{project\_start}_p)$
    \item[G2] \texttt{maximize\_team\_size}: $\max \sum_{t \in \mathcal{T}} \text{team\_size}_t$
    \item[G3] \texttt{minimize\_worker\_unavailability}: $\min \sum_{w \in \mathcal{W}} \mathbb{I}(\text{availability}_w = \text{false})$
    \item[G4] \texttt{maximize\_feature\_priority}: $\max \sum_{f \in \mathcal{F}} \text{priority}_f$
    \item[G5] \texttt{minimize\_sprint\_duration}: $\min \sum_{sp \in \mathcal{SP}} (\text{end\_date}_{sp} - \text{start\_date}_{sp})$
    \item[G6] \texttt{maximize\_sprint\_achievement}: $\max \sum_{sp \in \mathcal{SP}} \text{achievement\_of\_goal}_{sp}$
    \item[G7] \texttt{minimize\_task\_effort}: $\min \sum_{k \in \mathcal{TSK}} \text{effort}_k$
    \item[G8] \texttt{maximize\_story\_points}: $\max \sum_{u \in \mathcal{US}} \text{story\_points}_u$
    \item[G9] \texttt{minimize\_blocker\_severity}: $\min \sum_{b \in \mathcal{BL}} \text{severity}_b$
    \item[G10] \texttt{maximize\_stakeholder\_influence}: $\max \sum_{sh \in \mathcal{SH}} \text{influence\_level}_{sh}$
    \item[G11] \texttt{minimize\_velocity\_trend\_decline}: $\min \sum_{v \in \mathcal{VEL}} \max(0, -\text{trend}_v)$
    \item[G12] \texttt{maximize\_release\_plan\_features}: $\max \sum_{rp \in \mathcal{REP}} |\text{included\_features}_{rp}|$
    \item[G13] \texttt{minimize\_documentation\_age}: $\min \sum_{fd \in \mathcal{FED}} (\text{current\_date} - \text{creation\_date}_{fd})$
    \item[G14] \texttt{maximize\_snapshot\_test\_pass\_rate}: $\max \sum_{d \in \mathcal{DEV}} \mathbb{I}(\text{test\_status}_d = \text{passed})$
\end{itemize}

\section{4. Conditions}
\begin{itemize}
    \item[C0] \texttt{require\_project\_status\_active}: $\forall p \in \mathcal{P},\ \text{status}_p = \text{active}$
    \item[C1] \texttt{require\_team\_status\_active}: $\forall t \in \mathcal{T},\ \text{team\_status}_t = \text{active}$
    \item[C2] \texttt{enforce\_worker\_status\_active}: $\forall w \in \mathcal{W},\ \text{status}_w = \text{active}$
    \item[C3] \texttt{require\_feature\_status\_completed}: $\forall f \in \mathcal{F},\ \text{status}_f = \text{completed} \Rightarrow \text{contribute to goal}$
    \item[C4] \texttt{enforce\_sprint\_status\_completed}: $\forall sp \in \mathcal{SP},\ \text{status}_{sp} = \text{completed}$
    \item[C5] \texttt{require\_user\_story\_status\_done}: $\forall u \in \mathcal{US},\ \text{status}_u = \text{done}$
    \item[C6] \texttt{require\_task\_status\_done}: $\forall k \in \mathcal{TSK},\ \text{status}_k = \text{done}$
    \item[C7] \texttt{avoid\_high\_severity\_blockers}: $\forall b \in \mathcal{BL},\ \text{severity}_b < \text{critical}$
    \item[C8] \texttt{require\_scrollbacklog\_status\_open}: $\forall pb \in \mathcal{PB},\ \text{status}_{pb} = \text{open}$
    \item[C9] \texttt{enforce\_sprint\_goal\_achieved}: $\forall sp \in \mathcal{SP},\ \text{achievement\_status}_{sp} = \text{achieved}$
    \item[C10] \texttt{require\_release\_status\_planned}: $\forall rp \in \mathcal{REP},\ \text{status}_{rp} = \text{planned}$
    \item[C11] \texttt{require\_roadmap\_status\_active}: $\forall m \in \mathcal{RM},\ \text{status}_m = \text{active}$
    \item[C12] \texttt{require\_dev\_snapshot\_deployed}: $\forall d \in \mathcal{DEV},\ \text{deployment\_target}_d \neq \text{none}$
    \item[C13] \texttt{require\_valid\_email\_format}: $\forall w \in \mathcal{W},\ \text{email}_w \text{ matches } \texttt{regex(email)}$
    \item[C14] \texttt{require\_role\_certified}: $\forall r \in \mathcal{R},\ \text{area\_of\_responsibility}_r \text{ requires certification}$
\end{itemize}

\section{5. DecisionVariables}
\begin{itemize}
    \item[DV0] $\text{project\_selection}_p \in \{0,1\},\ \forall p \in \mathcal{P}$
    \item[DV1] $\text{team\_assignment}_{t,p} \in \{0,1\},\ \forall t \in \mathcal{T}, p \in \mathcal{P}$
    \item[DV2] $\text{worker\_allocation}_{w,t} \in \{0,1\},\ \forall w \in \mathcal{W}, t \in \mathcal{T}$
    \item[DV3] $\text{feature\_inclusion}_f \in \{0,1\},\ \forall f \in \mathcal{F}$
    \item[DV4] $\text{epic\_breakdown}_e \in [1,10],\ \forall e \in \mathcal{E}$
    \item[DV5] $\text{user\_story\_completion}_u \in \{0,1\},\ \forall u \in \mathcal{US}$
    \item[DV6] $\text{task\_assignment}_{k,w} \in \{0,1\},\ \forall k \in \mathcal{TSK}, w \in \mathcal{W}$
    \item[DV7] $\text{sprint\_inclusion}_{sp} \in \{0,1\},\ \forall sp \in \mathcal{SP}$
    \item[DV8] $\text{blocker\_resolution\_time}_b \in [0,90],\ \forall b \in \mathcal{BL}$
    \item[DV9] $\text{documentation\_update\_needed}_{fd} \in \{0,1\},\ \forall fd \in \mathcal{FED}$
    \item[DV10] $\text{release\_inclusion}_{f,rp} \in \{0,1\},\ \forall f \in \mathcal{F}, rp \in \mathcal{REP}$
    \item[DV11] $\text{velocity\_prediction}_v \in [5,30],\ \forall v \in \mathcal{VEL}$
    \item[DV12] $\text{scrum\_board\_update\_freq}_{sp} \in [0,5],\ \forall sp \in \mathcal{SP}$
    \item[DV13] $\text{daily\_scrum\_attendance}_w \in [0,1],\ \forall w \in \mathcal{W}$
    \item[DV14] $\text{stakeholder\_feedback\_score}_{sh} \in [1,5],\ \forall sh \in \mathcal{SH}$
\end{itemize}

\end{document}
```

---

Based on Entities.csv and Relationships.csv - Proceed and Create 3 individual CSV code-blocks (alternative: files) in chat named: Goals.csv + Conditions.csv + DecisionVariables.csv
Goals.csv must have the following header: "ID,Name,Description,IsSum,GoalType,EntityName,EntityAttribute,CriteriaType,Weight"
Conditions.csv must have the following header: "ID,Name,Description,IsSum,GoalType,EntityName,EntityAttribute,CriteriaType,Weight"
DecisionVariables.csv must have the following header: "ID,Name,Description,DataType,Domain,MinValue,MaxValue"

The following conventions must be applied:
ID starts with a letter G(oals), C(onditions), D(ecision)V(ariables) and a number follows, starting at 0, 1, 2, ....
Name is written snake_case
Names for Goals must begin with "maximize_" or "minimize_"
IsSum is a boolean { True, False }
GoalType is one of { "min", "max" }
EntityName is always only 1 entry from the "Name" of Entities.csv
EntityAttribute is one of the values in the "Attribute0" to "Attribute8" of the targeted Entity in Entities.csv
CriteriaType is a number { 2 = Must-Match, 1 = May-Match, 0 = Cannot-Match }
Domain can represent set of values like "{0,1}"
MinValue is the smallest value that can be set
MaxValue is the highest value that can be set
Weight is a mulptlier
Created 10 to 15 entries in each of these files.

Use ALL of the previously provided and generated CSV data (Entities, Relations, Goals, Conditions, DecisionVariables) and formulate the optimization model mathematically and logically. 
Write it into a code-block for a LaTeX (.tex) file and provide the generated Latex code in chat.
The file consists of a introduction page with Title, Author, Date and Table of Contents.
The actual file contest consists of 5 different \sections labeled "1. Sets (Entities)", "2. Indices", "3. Goals", "4. Conditions", "5. DecisionVariables"
The items of each category are itemized between \begin and \end.
Goals and Conditions show both their IDs, Names and the logical and mathematical representation

Transform all of the provided and generated CSV data (Entities, Attributes, Relations, Goals, Conditions, DecisionVariables) into a graph using the Mermaid.js Live Editor graph TD syntax.
Connect...
- Entities with their Attributes and place the Attributes around the Entities they belong to. (can exist multiple times in the graph to make lines less short)
- Entities with their Relations
- Goals with the Entity/Attributes
- Conditions with the Entity/Attributes
- DecisionVariables with their relevant Entities

Colorize...
- Entities in blue
- Attributes in white
- Relations in orange
- Goals in green
- Conditions in red
- Decision Variables in purple

Provide all 5 code-blocks (files) in chat:
3 Comma-Seperated-Values (csv), 1 LaTeX (tex), 1 Mermaid (mmd)

### ✅ **4. model.tex (LaTeX)**
```latex
\documentclass[12pt]{article}
\usepackage{amsmath}
\usepackage{geometry}
\usepackage{hyperref}
\usepackage{enumitem}
\usepackage{titlesec}

\geometry{margin=1in}
\title{SCRUM-Based Software Development Optimization Model}
\author{Domain Modeling System}
\date{\today}
\titleformat{\section}{\large\bfseries}{\thesection}{1em}{}

\begin{document}

\maketitle
\tableofcontents
\newpage

\section{1. Sets (Entities)}
\begin{itemize}
    \item $\mathcal{P}$: Set of Projects
    \item $\mathcal{T}$: Set of Teams
    \item $\mathcal{W}$: Set of Workers
    \item $\mathcal{F}$: Set of Features
    \item $\mathcal{S}$: Set of Skills
    \item $\mathcal{R}$: Set of Roles
    \item $\mathcal{PO}$: Set of Product Owners
    \item $\mathcal{SM}$: Set of Scrum Masters
    \item $\mathcal{PB}$: Set of Product Backlogs
    \item $\mathcal{SP}$: Set of Sprints
    \item $\mathcal{US}$: Set of User Stories
    \item $\mathcal{TSK}$: Set of Tasks
    \item $\mathcal{BL}$: Set of Blockers
    \item $\mathcal{SH}$: Set of Stakeholders
    \item $\mathcal{VEL}$: Set of Velocity Records
    \item $\mathcal{REP}$: Set of Release Plans
    \item $\mathcal{RM}$: Set of Roadmaps
    \item $\mathcal{DEV}$: Set of Development Snapshots
    \item $\mathcal{FED}$: Set of Feature Documentations
\end{itemize}

\section{2. Indices}
\begin{itemize}
    \item $p \in \mathcal{P}$: Index for projects
    \item $t \in \mathcal{T}$: Index for teams
    \item $w \in \mathcal{W}$: Index for workers
    \item $f \in \mathcal{F}$: Index for features
    \item $s \in \mathcal{S}$: Index for skills
    \item $r \in \mathcal{R}$: Index for roles
    \item $sp \in \mathcal{SP}$: Index for sprints
    \item $u \in \mathcal{US}$: Index for user stories
    \item $k \in \mathcal{TSK}$: Index for tasks
    \item $b \in \mathcal{BL}$: Index for blockers
    \item $sh \in \mathcal{SH}$: Index for stakeholders
    \item $v \in \mathcal{VEL}$: Index for velocity records
    \item $rp \in \mathcal{REP}$: Index for release plans
    \item $m \in \mathcal{RM}$: Index for roadmaps
    \item $d \in \mathcal{DEV}$: Index for development snapshots
    \item $fd \in \mathcal{FED}$: Index for feature documentations
\end{itemize}

\section{3. Goals}
\begin{itemize}
    \item[G0] \texttt{maximize\_project\_budget}: $\max \sum_{p \in \mathcal{P}} \text{budget}_p \cdot \text{Weight}_{G0}$
    \item[G1] \texttt{minimize\_project\_duration}: $\min \sum_{p \in \mathcal{P}} (\text{project\_end}_p - \text{project\_start}_p)$
    \item[G2] \texttt{maximize\_team\_size}: $\max \sum_{t \in \mathcal{T}} \text{team\_size}_t$
    \item[G3] \texttt{minimize\_worker\_unavailability}: $\min \sum_{w \in \mathcal{W}} \mathbb{I}(\text{availability}_w = \text{false})$
    \item[G4] \texttt{maximize\_feature\_priority}: $\max \sum_{f \in \mathcal{F}} \text{priority}_f$
    \item[G5] \texttt{minimize\_sprint\_duration}: $\min \sum_{sp \in \mathcal{SP}} (\text{end\_date}_{sp} - \text{start\_date}_{sp})$
    \item[G6] \texttt{maximize\_sprint\_achievement}: $\max \sum_{sp \in \mathcal{SP}} \text{achievement\_of\_goal}_{sp}$
    \item[G7] \texttt{minimize\_task\_effort}: $\min \sum_{k \in \mathcal{TSK}} \text{effort}_k$
    \item[G8] \texttt{maximize\_story\_points}: $\max \sum_{u \in \mathcal{US}} \text{story\_points}_u$
    \item[G9] \texttt{minimize\_blocker\_severity}: $\min \sum_{b \in \mathcal{BL}} \text{severity}_b$
    \item[G10] \texttt{maximize\_stakeholder\_influence}: $\max \sum_{sh \in \mathcal{SH}} \text{influence\_level}_{sh}$
    \item[G11] \texttt{minimize\_velocity\_trend\_decline}: $\min \sum_{v \in \mathcal{VEL}} \max(0, -\text{trend}_v)$
    \item[G12] \texttt{maximize\_release\_plan\_features}: $\max \sum_{rp \in \mathcal{REP}} |\text{included\_features}_{rp}|$
    \item[G13] \texttt{minimize\_documentation\_age}: $\min \sum_{fd \in \mathcal{FED}} (\text{current\_date} - \text{creation\_date}_{fd})$
    \item[G14] \texttt{maximize\_snapshot\_test\_pass\_rate}: $\max \sum_{d \in \mathcal{DEV}} \mathbb{I}(\text{test\_status}_d = \text{passed})$
\end{itemize}

\section{4. Conditions}
\begin{itemize}
    \item[C0] \texttt{require\_project\_status\_active}: $\forall p \in \mathcal{P},\ \text{status}_p = \text{active}$
    \item[C1] \texttt{require\_team\_status\_active}: $\forall t \in \mathcal{T},\ \text{team\_status}_t = \text{active}$
    \item[C2] \texttt{enforce\_worker\_status\_active}: $\forall w \in \mathcal{W},\ \text{status}_w = \text{active}$
    \item[C3] \texttt{require\_feature\_status\_completed}: $\forall f \in \mathcal{F},\ \text{status}_f = \text{completed} \Rightarrow \text{contribute to goal}$
    \item[C4] \texttt{enforce\_sprint\_status\_completed}: $\forall sp \in \mathcal{SP},\ \text{status}_{sp} = \text{completed}$
    \item[C5] \texttt{require\_user\_story\_status\_done}: $\forall u \in \mathcal{US},\ \text{status}_u = \text{done}$
    \item[C6] \texttt{require\_task\_status\_done}: $\forall k \in \mathcal{TSK},\ \text{status}_k = \text{done}$
    \item[C7] \texttt{avoid\_high\_severity\_blockers}: $\forall b \in \mathcal{BL},\ \text{severity}_b < \text{critical}$
    \item[C8] \texttt{require\_scrollbacklog\_status\_open}: $\forall pb \in \mathcal{PB},\ \text{status}_{pb} = \text{open}$
    \item[C9] \texttt{enforce\_sprint\_goal\_achieved}: $\forall sp \in \mathcal{SP},\ \text{achievement\_status}_{sp} = \text{achieved}$
    \item[C10] \texttt{require\_release\_status\_planned}: $\forall rp \in \mathcal{REP},\ \text{status}_{rp} = \text{planned}$
    \item[C11] \texttt{require\_roadmap\_status\_active}: $\forall m \in \mathcal{RM},\ \text{status}_m = \text{active}$
    \item[C12] \texttt{require\_dev\_snapshot\_deployed}: $\forall d \in \mathcal{DEV},\ \text{deployment\_target}_d \neq \text{none}$
    \item[C13] \texttt{require\_valid\_email\_format}: $\forall w \in \mathcal{W},\ \text{email}_w \text{ matches } \texttt{regex(email)}$
    \item[C14] \texttt{require\_role\_certified}: $\forall r \in \mathcal{R},\ \text{area\_of\_responsibility}_r \text{ requires certification}$
\end{itemize}

\section{5. DecisionVariables}
\begin{itemize}
    \item[DV0] $\text{project\_selection}_p \in \{0,1\},\ \forall p \in \mathcal{P}$
    \item[DV1] $\text{team\_assignment}_{t,p} \in \{0,1\},\ \forall t \in \mathcal{T}, p \in \mathcal{P}$
    \item[DV2] $\text{worker\_allocation}_{w,t} \in \{0,1\},\ \forall w \in \mathcal{W}, t \in \mathcal{T}$
    \item[DV3] $\text{feature\_inclusion}_f \in \{0,1\},\ \forall f \in \mathcal{F}$
    \item[DV4] $\text{epic\_breakdown}_e \in [1,10],\ \forall e \in \mathcal{E}$
    \item[DV5] $\text{user\_story\_completion}_u \in \{0,1\},\ \forall u \in \mathcal{US}$
    \item[DV6] $\text{task\_assignment}_{k,w} \in \{0,1\},\ \forall k \in \mathcal{TSK}, w \in \mathcal{W}$
    \item[DV7] $\text{sprint\_inclusion}_{sp} \in \{0,1\},\ \forall sp \in \mathcal{SP}$
    \item[DV8] $\text{blocker\_resolution\_time}_b \in [0,90],\ \forall b \in \mathcal{BL}$
    \item[DV9] $\text{documentation\_update\_needed}_{fd} \in \{0,1\},\ \forall fd \in \mathcal{FED}$
    \item[DV10] $\text{release\_inclusion}_{f,rp} \in \{0,1\},\ \forall f \in \mathcal{F}, rp \in \mathcal{REP}$
    \item[DV11] $\text{velocity\_prediction}_v \in [5,30],\ \forall v \in \mathcal{VEL}$
    \item[DV12] $\text{scrum\_board\_update\_freq}_{sp} \in [0,5],\ \forall sp \in \mathcal{SP}$
    \item[DV13] $\text{daily\_scrum\_attendance}_w \in [0,1],\ \forall w \in \mathcal{W}$
    \item[DV14] $\text{stakeholder\_feedback\_score}_{sh} \in [1,5],\ \forall sh \in \mathcal{SH}$
\end{itemize}

\end{document}
```
